name: Fiery Disaster
description: Test your mind with this twist on a Tower Defense genre, wrapped up in a deep, dark story! Play as a scientist punishing ignorant peasants with burning balls of lava!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2.8 GHz Memory: 1536 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 2000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2 GHz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
